title: In pictures: Death, destruction, debris in Iran and Israel amid war - World - DAWN.COM
content:
Israel and Iran have been trading missile strikes since the former launched an air offensive on Friday, killing commanders and scientists and bombing nuclear sites in a stated bid to stop Tehran from building an atomic weapon.

The pictures below show some of the widespread destruction in both nations caused by the ongoing conflict.

Header image: Smoke billows from a site in central Tehran, as fighting between Israel and Iran continues on June 16. â€” AFP
